casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
David Eugene MITCHELL, Jr. No. 41P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. C. Scott Holmes, Durham, for David E. Mitchell, Jr. David Kirkman, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th day of January 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of April 2006."
